models.prompt:
Charles conducted a survey to find out where most of the people in his town went for their summer vacation last year. He set up a table at the community festival and invited people at random to fill out his survey. A total of 100 participants filled out his survey. His results are shown in the tables.

YesNo
Did you take a trip during your summer vacation last year? 85 15
BeachTheme parkBig cityNational parkOther
If you did travel, where did you go on your summer vacation last year? 32 11 8 22 12

Which statement is a valid inference that Charles can draw based on the results of his survey?
